Description:
Hello. What is you experience on enabling immutability for MS SQL backups while running Always on AGs on VM? Backups must locked and not be modifiable after written. I have looked at ~7 different solutions but non of them seems to be ideal.

Thanks for you time!
EnhancedContent:
Hello. What is you experience on enabling immutability for MS SQL backups while running Always on AGs on VM? Backups must locked and not be modifiable after written. I have looked at ~7 different solutions but non of them seems to be ideal.

Thanks for you time!
Title: MS SQL backup immutability
Author: x1mri
